ProjectTitle: Transcultural Memories through a Jewish Lens: Remapping Italian Literatures of Migration

Very good DMP. Just one suggestion: you could use the newly developed KU Leuven Research Data Respository (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) to publish your data for reuse or as evidence for your papers.
